import React from 'react'; import styles from '../styles/About.module.css'; const About = () => { const skillCategories = [ { title: "Programming Languages & Frameworks", skills: [ { name: "Python", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/python/python-original.svg" }, { name: "R", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/r/r-original.svg" }, { name: "Java", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/java/java-original.svg" }, { name: "Spring Boot", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/spring/spring-original.svg" }, { name: "Angular", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/angularjs/angularjs-original.svg" }, { name: "C#", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/csharp/csharp-original.svg" }, { name: "Bash", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/bash/bash-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Databases", skills: [ { name: "SQL Server", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/microsoftsqlserver/microsoftsqlserver-plain.svg" }, { name: "MySQL", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mysql/mysql-original.svg" }, { name: "MongoDB", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/mongodb/mongodb-original.svg" }, { name: "Elasticsearch", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Data Science & Machine Learning", skills: [ { name: "Python", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/python/python-original.svg" }, { name: "R", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/r/r-original.svg" }, { name: "Pandas", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/pandas/pandas-original.svg" }, { name: "NumPy", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/numpy/numpy-original.svg" }, { name: "Scikit-learn", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/05/Scikit_learn_logo_small.svg" }, { name: "TensorFlow", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/tensorflow/tensorflow-original.svg" }, { name: "Keras", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/ae/Keras_logo.svg" }, { name: "PyTorch", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/pytorch/pytorch-original.svg" }, { name: "Ollama", logo: "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/151674099?s=280&v=4" }, { name: "Matplotlib", logo: "https://matplotlib.org/stable/_static/images/logo2.svg" }, { name: "Plotly", logo: "https://images.plot.ly/logo/new-branding/plotly-logomark.png" }, { name: "RStudio", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/rstudio/rstudio-original.svg" } ] }, { title: "Data Engineering", skills: [ { name: "ETL", logo: "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/2103/2103633.png" }, { name: "Apache NiFi", logo: "https://nifi.apache.org/assets/images/apache-nifi-logo.svg" }, { name: "Power BI", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/cf/New_Power_BI_Logo.svg" }, { name: "Data Warehouse", logo: "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/2103/2103658.png" }, { name: "XML", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/xml/xml-original.svg" }, { name: "RDF", logo: "https://www.w3.org/RDF/icons/rdf_w3c_icon.128.gif" }, { name: "OWL", logo: "https://protege.stanford.edu/assets/images/protege-logo.png" }, { name: "SPARQL", logo: "https://www.w3.org/2001/sw/wiki/images/f/ff/Sparql.png" }, { name: "MDX", logo: "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/2103/2103665.png" }, { name: "HL7", logo: "https://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/vocab/V3guide/logo_hl7.gif" }, { name: "FHIR", logo: "https://www.hl7.org/fhir/assets/images/fhir-logo-www.png" }, { name: "Postman", logo: "https://www.vectorlogo.zone/logos/getpostman/getpostman-icon.svg" } ] }, { title: "Cloud & DevOps", skills: [ { name: "Git", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/git/git-original.svg" }, { name: "Linux", logo: "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/devicons/devicon/icons/linux/linux-original.svg" } ] } ]; return (
{/* ABOUT ME SECTION */}

About Me

Hello everyone! I'm Marta Cuevas, and I'm from the beautiful city of Málaga, Spain.

I recently completed my studies as a Health Engineer, where I discovered my passion for combining technology with healthcare to create innovative solutions that can make a real difference in people's lives.

Beyond my professional interests, I'm someone who loves sports, traveling, and meeting new people. I believe that every journey and every person you meet teaches you something valuable. I'm always eager to learn new things, explore different cultures, and challenge myself with new experiences.

Whether it's discovering a new hiking trail, learning a new programming language, or simply having a coffee with someone from a different background, I find joy in the continuous process of growth and discovery.

{/* PROFESSIONAL BACKGROUND */}

Professional Background

Marta Cuevas

Health Engineer

I'm a health engineer passionate about the intersection between technology and medicine. My focus centers on developing innovative solutions that improve healthcare quality and optimize clinical processes through data science, artificial intelligence, and cutting-edge technologies.

{/* TODAS LAS CATEGORÍAS DE SKILLS */}

Technologies & Tools

{skillCategories.map((category, categoryIndex) => (

{category.title}

{category.skills.map((skill, skillIndex) => (
{ e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex'; }} />
{skill.name.charAt(0)}
{skill.name}
))}
))}
); }; export default About;
